data.name: Late For Class
data.detailed_description:
You missed the bus. You are Late For Class.



  • CHALLENGING LEVELS. Each level becomes harder as new mechanics and abilities are introduced. Drive, use boost, make your toy car jump and fly as you make your way to school.

  • OBSTACLES. You will see all kinds of static and dynamic obstacles & traps on your way. Those can be very frustrating to deal with, but learning how to avoid them will feel very rewarding.

  • NO HELMET. Protect your head by any means! Hitting your head means you have to restart the level.

  • EXPLORE & COMPETE. Find shortcuts and other speedrun strats to beat the levels as fast as possible and earn your place on the top of the global leaderboards!

  • CUSTOMIZATION. Improve your journey by customizing the look of your toy car. Beat the levels to unlock cooler paint jobs and other stuff.
data.about_the_game:
You missed the bus. You are Late For Class.

  • OBSTACLES. You will see all kinds of static and dynamic obstacles & traps on your way. Those can be very frustrating to deal with, but learning how to avoid them will feel very rewarding.

  • NO HELMET. Protect your head by any means! Hitting your head means you have to restart the level.

  • EXPLORE & COMPETE. Find shortcuts and other speedrun strats to beat the levels as fast as possible and earn your place on the top of the global leaderboards!

  • CUSTOMIZATION. Improve your journey by customizing the look of your toy car. Beat the levels to unlock cooler paint jobs and other stuff.
data.short_description: Protect your head and get to school in one piece while driving (and flying!) your toy car through different terrains and avoiding obstacles.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7
  • Processor: Intel Core i3-540 (~3GHz)
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Radeon HD 7870 | GeForce GTX 650 Ti (~2GB)
  • Storage: 10 GB available space

content_descriptors.notes: When the character hits his head on an obstacle/trap/road, blood will appear on his face/head region.
